additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Glucose Syrup, Sugar, Water, Wheat Starch, Humectant (422), Acidity Regulator (330), Flavour, Natural Colour (153), Acidity Regulator (336)

additionalProperty.name: Warning

description: How sweet it is with Life Savers Blackcurrant Pastilles. Our mouth-watering, juicy and bold Blackcurrant flavour brings all the feels.
name: Blackcurrant Pastilles
